<title level="1" pfs="">[Jailer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3555)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A jailer's primary responsibility is to keep prisoners from escaping. Jailers must often use force, or the threat of force, to keep their charges in line, as even the most carefully crafted cells, manacles, or chains can fail with time and persistence when the prisoners have the will to attempt an escape.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<trait label="Medium" />

<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 112

**Perception** +9; (10 to find concealed objects) 

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +11, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +5, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +7

<row gap="medium">

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Club](/Weapons.aspx?ID=2), [Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) (20 bolts), keyring, [simple manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32), [Signal Whistle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=50), [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

**[Reactive Strike](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=48)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
club +11,
**Damage** 1d6+8 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+8 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
crossbow +10 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d8+4 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
club +10 ([thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+8 bludgeoning

**Efficient Capture** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The jailer has [manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2733) in hand and is adjacent to a creature; **Effect** The jailer attempts to bind the creature's wrists or ankles with the manacles. If the jailer succeeds at an attack roll with a +9 modifier against the target's AC, they apply the manacles.

**Intimidating Strike** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The jailer makes a melee Strike. If it hits and deals damage, the target is [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76), or frightened 2 on a critical hit.

**Subdue Prisoners**   The jailer doesn't take the normal penalty for making a [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=661) attack when attacking with their club.

</column>
